mapper.select: SELECT ITEMS_ID,TITLE,ITEMS_STATE,PRICE,UP_DATE,USER_ID FROM ITEMS ORDER BY ITEMS_ID DESC
SELECT ITEMS_IMG_ID, FILE_NAME FROM ITEMS_IMG ORDER BY ITEMS_IMG_ID DESC
mapper.insert: insert into ITEMS(ITEMS_ID, TITLE, ITEMS_STATE, PRICE, UP_DATE, ITEMS_IMG_ID,USER_ID,TAG_ID) values(ITEMS_ID.nextval, #{title}, #{itemsState}, #{price}, sysdate, NULL, NULL, NULL)
insert into ITEMS_IMG(ITEMS_IMG_ID, PATH_IMG, FILE_NAME) values('U'||ITEMS_IMG_ID.nextval, NULL,#{fileName})
